page.title: 14THORNBURY INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The kinds of work here fall into four main groups ; light industry, supply and services,workshops and distribution. Light Industry _ electronics and microtechnology, scientific instruments, power systems,ice cream manufacture, dairy products, and packaging. Workshops _ crafts like making stained glass and wooden garden furniture; also workshops doing metal welding and grinding, and car body repairs. Services and Supply _ metal stock, tyres, glass and timber merchants, carpentry, carpets, exhibition stands, building and industrial services. Distribution _ in addition to supermarket suppliers there are smaller firms dealing with office stationery, cigarettes and eggs.
